  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LogbackAppenderRegistrar
    Spring component that registers the custom MongoLogAppender with Logback loggers once the application is ready.
    MongoLogAppender
    A custom Logback appender that batches log events and writes them to MongoDB asynchronously using a background thread pool.
    MongoLogBuffer
    Component that manages a buffer for LogEvent objects using a BlockingQueue.
